summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.4 mm), light levels (up 3062 lux), and cloud levels (up 409 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1344 m), light levels (up 5411 lux), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), and outside temperature (up 2.5°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 409.1m lower than yesterday, 953.4m lower than past week, 1344.2m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1464.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2420m and 2810m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, very clammy and humid. Chance of light rain, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
